attributes.action: Please consider regulation and limiting of private social media companies.
attributes.additional_details: Social media companies hold too much power and they have too much influence. They conflate freedom of speech with regulation. This is nothing to do with free speech, a private social media company is not a platform for free speech and never will be unless the owners relinquish ownership to the public.
attributes.background: Social media companies that fail to protect users, especially under 16's rom inaccurate and harmful content should be removed from app stores. Violent, sexual and inappropriate content, unless private, should be limited to a watershed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require social media platforms to identify and remove all unsafe content.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710557
